tool.name: IsValid
tool.command: $__tool_directory__/Code/openapi.py isArrayInputPolygon False name IsValid InputPolygon $InputPolygon prefer $prefer response $response

param.name: InputPolygon
param.label: the first geometry
param.help: the first geometry to compare against. The following data types are allowed in the txt file: xml

param.name: response
param.label: Response Type
param.help: Choose 'raw' for raw data or 'document' for document data.

tool.help: This service shall return a TRUE value if and only if the geometry g is valid
